Text: PIP FormPST Kam Here is the form Regards Frank

PIP FormPST Attached are the recommended PIP forms for your rated employees Please complete the appropriate form and forward to me for review I will be sending your completed form to legal for their review and will notify you once it has been approved Additionally I will be sitting in on your feedback and development plan meetings Please contact me if you have any questions Regards Frank

Enron Reward Bucks Modification Cc hr Based on the suggestion made in Sally Becks last staff meeting we have modified the Enron Reward Bucks program to include the recognition of Managers With regards to the process you will continue to utilize the nomination form for Sr Specialist and below and follow the same criteria When ordering future debit cards we recommend you include denominations of and to handle the additional recognition In the interim when nominating a Manager you can combine denominations to equal the amount you are interested in rewarding for example and card or cards We are not suggesting that you award at this amount however it is available to use at your discretion The Enron Reward Bucks maximize at where PBAs generally range from though with committee approval can range higher These programs are intended to compliment each other and we encourage you to utilize them to recognize and reward your team We will continue to evaluate these programs and make changes as needed from both a business and employee perspective Please feel free to contact your HR representative if you have further questions on the programs or recommendations on how they can be improved Please share this with your staff Regards Frank
Programmer Plus Report Cc Sally Attached is the information on the Programmer Plus Program we discussed Let me know if you have any questions Regards Frank

Employment Contract Retention Report Cc Sally Here is a detail version of the Employment Contract Retention Report We will provide you with a summary version when we reschedule our meeting Let us know if you have any questions Regards Frank Hector
TestTest

Transition Cc This is to inform you that effective immediately your human resource representative will be Hector McLouglin Please channel any questions or concerns to him I will be moving over to service corporate I would like to take this opportunity to tell you what an honor it has been servicing you Regards Frank

Transition Cc PST This is to inform you that effective immediately your human resource representative will be Hector McLouglin Please channel any questions or concerns to him I will be moving over to service corporate I would like to take this opportunity to tell you what an honor it has been servicing you Regards Frank
PEP System Cc The PEP system will not be open on Nov for manager or employees as previously stated Please let your staff know I will keep you abreast of any further developments Regards Frank

FW Business Rationale for Retentionpst Rick We are still going to need the business rationale for each employee placed on a retention or milestone program This information will be required by the creditors Please let me know if I can be of any assistance Regards Frank Original Message From De Jesus Frank Sent Thursday January PM To Buy Rick Subject Business Rationale for Retention As per our discussion the first step was to identify the participants in the retention program The next step is to build the business case for why these employees are critical and irreplaceable to your business unit Please provided a brief rational for why these employees were selected Additionally if there is a unique situation or circumstance that makes your area more vulnerable please included in an overall business summary For example if your unit has a limited number of people supporting a critical area necessary to maintaining or increasing the value of the estate or the liquidation of assets include this in your business summary Demonstrate why it would be difficult to train someone else to perform a similar function You should also comment on why the employee was recommended for the Milestone Program As you know this information is time sensitive so please try and get it to me as soon as possible I appreciate you taking time out of your busy schedule to meet with me on such short notice Please call me x if you have any questions Regards Frank
Rudi Zipter Cc Irma Can you pls process a termination for Rudi Zipter He is being severed as of Reason for termination is reorganization Let me know if you have any questions Regards Frank

RE Business Rationale for Retention Cc Rick I hear you If you can provided an overall business rationale that applies to several people that would be sufficient As long as you indicated whether they are helping with liquidation maintaining the estate or both Regards Frank Original Message From Buy Rick Sent Tuesday January PM To De Jesus Frank Subject RE Business Rationale for Retention will do i keep losing people though so it changes the landscape rick Original Message From De Jesus Frank Sent Tuesday January AM To Buy Rick Subject FW Business Rationale for Retention Rick We are still going to need the business rationale for each employee placed on a retention or milestone program This information will be required by the creditors Please let me know if I can be of any assistance Regards Frank Original Message From De Jesus Frank Sent Thursday January PM To Buy Rick Subject Business Rationale for Retention As per our discussion the first step was to identify the participants in the retention program The next step is to build the business case for why these employees are critical and irreplaceable to your business unit Please provided a brief rational for why these employees were selected Additionally if there is a unique situation or circumstance that makes your area more vulnerable please included in an overall business summary For example if your unit has a limited number of people supporting a critical area necessary to maintaining or increasing the value of the estate or the liquidation of assets include this in your business summary Demonstrate why it would be difficult to train someone else to perform a similar function You should also comment on why the employee was recommended for the Milestone Program As you know this information is time sensitive so please try and get it to me as soon as possible I appreciate you taking time out of your busy schedule to meet with me on such short notice Please call me x if you have any questions Regards Frank

FW Open Positions in Omahapst Please let Dan Batista know if you have a current or terminated employee that can fill the positions below Dan can be reached at x Regards Frank Original Message From Labbe Anne Sent Wednesday January AM To Walton Sheila Funkhouser Shanna Bosien Teresa Kinningham Laura De Jesus Frank Booth Khymberly Brown Daniel Slone Jeanie Russi Estalee Pieper Kalen Davis Sarah A Subject FW Open Positions in Omaha Please let Dan know if you have anyone who is qualified for these positions Thanks Anne Original Message From Batista Daniel Sent Tuesday January AM To Labbe Anne Subject Open Positions in Omaha Anne Per our discussion this morning attached are the open positions we discussed We need to fill these positions asap Any help you can provide would be appreciated Please have all resumes referred to me Thanks Dan

FW Peoplepst Please let us know if you have anyone available My understanding is if we have to got to the outside it will cost us per hour per person We appreciate your support Regards Frank Original Message From Mayes Fran Sent Monday January PM To Funkhouser Shanna Brown Daniel De Jesus Frank Hickok Kim Labbe Anne McLoughlin Hector Slone Jeanie Blaylock John Cc Jones Robert W HR Exec Oxley David Pieper Kalen Subject People Importance High The Corporate Development group is in need of extra people with some free time on their hands to assist in manning data rooms that are being set up for the potential sale of Enron Wind If you know of any employee who would be available please let me know ASAP The employee does not have to be familiar with the business just capable of watching the area and ensuring that Enrons property is securely maintained The hours are am to pm and we are slotting people in based on their availability The data rooms are at the ENRON building the Crowne Plaza Hotel and the Warwick Hotel Thanks Fran Mayes HR Manager Phone Fax CellPager or

FW Future Terminations Cc As per Sonja Galloways request we have been ask to supply this information no later than close of business tomorrow This information is time sensitive we apologize for the short notice Please call your HR representative if you have any questions Regards Frank Original Message From Galloway Sonja Sent Friday January PM To Barrow Cynthia Taylor Diane Wheeler Terrie Davis Sarah A Shapiro Richard Palmer Mark A PR Brindle John Donovan Bill McAdoo Jack V Rieker Paula Derrick Jr James Buy Rick Cc Wright Teresa De Jesus Frank Bosien Teresa Hope Valeria A Subject Future Terminations Hello to all In an effort to maintain correct data and effectively handle transitions please notify your appropriate HR Rep of any known future terminations that may happen within the next days These terminations should include both Voluntary and Involuntary terms Please let me know if there are any questions Thank you Sonja Galloway Frank De Jesus HR Rep Public Affairs Risk Assessment Control Government Affairs Terry Bosien HR Rep Corporate Secretary Corporate Legal Credit Union Valeria Hope HR Rep Human Resources

RE Status of Rudi Zipter Cc Rick Thanks Let me know if you need to discuss further Regards Frank Original Message From Buy Rick Sent Friday January PM To De Jesus Frank Subject RE Status of Rudi Zipter Retained Houston office Tx Rick Original Message From De Jesus Frank Sent Friday January AM To Buy Rick Cc Tessandori Bobbi Subject Status of Rudi Zipter Rick What is Rudi Zipters status He has sent a couple of emails to Bobbi Tessandori our immigration representative He has taken vacation and paternity and repatriated back to the US Is he working in the office Is he going to be retained Please advise Regards Frank

FW ZIPTER Work Statuspst Rick FYI see Rudis note below Regards Frank Original Message From Tessandori Bobbi Sent Friday January AM To De Jesus Frank Subject ZIPTER Work Status FYI Our greatest glory is not in never failing but in rising up every time we fail Ralph Waldo Emerson Best Regards Bobbi International Human Resources tel fax eff Jan work space ECN A eff Jan Smith St Houston TX email Original Message From ENRON Sent Friday January PM To Tessandori Bobbi Cc Murphy Ted Subject Work Status Bobbi In the midst of the Enron bankruptcy in december I discussed my situation my wifes late term pregnancy with my immediate supervisor Ted Murphy We agreed that with the uncertainty we should return to Houston and check with Teds Houston team for next steps When I returned to Houston and requested information on my work status no one was able to inform me whether I was employed or had been laid off At this point I decided to use my outstanding vacation time to find a place to live and prepare for the baby We are expecting the babys arrival at any time Afterwards I will take a paternity leave and discuss my options with Ted at that time Regards Rudi PS feel free to call me at with questions

Status of Rudi Zipter Cc Rick What is Rudi Zipters status He has sent a couple of emails to Bobbi Tessandori our immigration representative He has taken vacation and paternity and repatriated back to the US Is he working in the office Is he going to be retained Please advise Regards Frank

FW RAC EEs Cc Rick FYI I recognize some of these from our recent conversation I assume they are still in your cost center and we do not need to transfer Regards Frank Original Message From Labbe Anne Sent Wednesday January PM To De Jesus Frank Subject RAC EEs Frank The following RAC employees are supposed to be moving back to the Estate from the NetCo list However I must forwarn you that we will not have a final list from Jeanie Amy until next week Veronica Gonzalez Paul Radous Susan Rance Rick Buy Bjorn Hagelmann Karen Heathman Charles Schneider

Business Rationale for Retentionpst As per our discussion the first step was to identify the participants in the retention program The next step is to build the business case for why these employees are critical and irreplaceable to your business unit Please provided a brief rational for why these employees were selected Additionally if there is a unique situation or circumstance that makes your area more vulnerable please included in an overall business summary For example if your unit has a limited number of people supporting a critical area necessary to maintaining or increasing the value of the estate or the liquidation of assets include this in your business summary Demonstrate why it would be difficult to train someone else to perform a similar function You should also comment on why the employee was recommended for the Milestone Program As you know this information is time sensitive so please try and get it to me as soon as possible I appreciate you taking time out of your busy schedule to meet with me on such short notice Please call me x if you have any questions Regards Frank

Rescind OffersTermination Letters Cc Tim We rescinded approximately offers in November It was decided that individuals who gave up jobs to accept our offer would be paid out one month of salary with a signed release I had two people who fell into this category and signed releases but have not received the one month salary Will they be paid out I have received several calls from terminated employees concerning the termination letters They are concerned that they have days in which to transfer to their spouses plan and wont meet the deadline My understanding is that the terminations letter will be mailed out soon Please advise Regards Frank

RE Relocation assistance Cc PST Stacey We made a commitment and I am comfortable with going forward Let me know if you have any questions Regards Frank Original Message From White Stacey W Sent Monday November PM To Postlethwaite John Cc De Jesus Frank Subject RE Relocation assistance As long as HR is ok with this so am I Stacey Original Message From Postlethwaite John Sent Monday November PM To White Stacey W Subject Relocation assistance Stacey part of my relocation package was the month mortgage subsidy In May I received the first installment for one year and due to the current situation with the company and with Enron at this point unsure about helping with a potential move back to Houston I wanted to receive the second installment as soon as possible Frank is ok with this but I wanted to check with you before anything else is done John

FW Letter of Resignation Cc PST Hector is this your area or Jeanie Slone Regards Frank Original Message From Carter Tim Sent Wednesday January PM To White Stacey W Cc De Jesus Frank Subject Letter of Resignation Stacey Id like to notify you that tomorrow January st will be my last day at Enron I am resigning to pursue another career opportunity It has been good working with you and I wish you and your team all the best Tim Carter
